metadata.synopsis: Shar cultist praying to herself in the aftermath of Viconia's defeat following a coup.

0.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
0.text: Bless us, Dark Lady. We have cleansed your church.
0.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

1.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
1.text: Only we who seek your embrace remain, Nightsinger.
1.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

2.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
2.text: We have fed them to the dark maw. They return to the nothingness that claims all.
2.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.

3.speaker: Sharran Novice Dohna
3.text: Pride corrupted those who claimed to serve you, but no more.
3.context: NodeContext: Solo murmured prayer to her dark goddess, in the aftermath of a coup and battle in which she was persuaded to side with the coup instigators.Now seeking blessing.
